hero.description: I'm an ML/AI Engineer & Backend Developer from Turkey. I create intelligent systems and robust backend solutions that make a difference.

service2.description: I create powerful, scalable and secure backend services with Django, Flask and ASP.NET Core.

service3.description: I analyze large datasets to develop business intelligence solutions and predictive models.
